title: Understanding the Matrix
text: The given matrix is an augmented matrix, which represents a system of linear equations. Each row of the matrix corresponds to one equation in the system, with the coefficients of $$x$$, $$y$$, and the constant on the right-hand side.

title: Writing the Equations
text: The first row of the augmented matrix represents the first equation, and the second row represents the second equation. Look at the matrix and convert each row into an equation by identifying the coefficients of $$x$$, $$y$$, and the constant on the right side.

title: First Equation
text: What would the first equation look like if the first constant is multiplied by $$x$$, the second by $$y$$, and the third is the constant on the right side?

title: Repeat
text: Repeat the steps for the remaining rows of the matrix.
